rules.title: How to play
rules.rule1: Tap one of your pits (bottom row) to sow
rules.rule2: Stones are distributed counter-clockwise, one in each pit
rules.rule4: If you land in a pit with stones, pick them up and continue
rules.rule5: Your turn ends when you land in an empty pit or your store
rules.rule6: Land in your store to get an extra turn
rules.rule7: Land in an empty pit on your side to capture opponent's stones across
rules.rule8: The player with the most stones in their store wins
